name: Bunker Buster (Sean_Likes_AoE)
description:
Brett Cross, A.K.A 'The Bunker Buster' is infiltrating the enemy's HQ. Be the best robot sidekick you can and get him there in one piece!

Open doors, turn off gas leaks, block bullets, and give health/ammo pickups to the hero.

CONTROLS
Move: WASD
Look: Mouse
Interact/Pickup/Drop: E
Restart: R
Exit/Enter Fullscreen Mode: Esc.

The game contains 3 levels (plus a credits level) and 3 difficulty settings.
Difficulty impacts the hero's max health, damage output, and health pickups.

This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam 33 as a solo developer.
Theme: "You Aren't The Hero"
